mapper.select: SELECT class_type, order_process, COUNT(*) AS count FROM "ORDER" JOIN "CLASS" USING(class_code) WHERE payment_date LIKE #{today}||'%' GROUP BY class_type, order_process

SELECT to_date(payment_date,'yyyy/MM/DD') AS payment_date, class_type, order_process, COUNT(*) AS count, SUM(payment) payment FROM "ORDER" JOIN "CLASS" USING(class_code) GROUP BY to_date(payment_date,'yyyy/MM/DD'), class_type, order_process HAVING to_date(payment_date,'yyyy/MM/DD') > to_date(sysdate - 5,'yyyy/MM/DD') ORDER BY to_date(payment_date,'yyyy/MM/DD'), class_type, order_process
